name: Grade12Bot
description: Telegram bot to get result of national exam ethiopia

API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

TOKEN.description: Bot token of Bot, get from @Botfather

MONGODB.description: Mongo DB database URI , get from https://cloud.mongodb.com, even if this is optional, many of functions may not work if this is not set.

ADMINS.description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands(for multiple users seperated by space)
